summary: The story of a mistreated donkey and the people around him. A study on saintliness and a sister piece to Bresson's Mouchette.
cast: Anne Wiazemsky|Walter Green|François Lafarge|Jean-Claude Guilbert|Philippe Asselin|Pierre Klossowski|Nathalie Joyaut|Marie-Claire Frémont|Jean-Joël Barbier|Guy Renault|Jean Rémignard|Guy Brejac|Mylène Weyergans|Jacques Sorbets|François Sullerot|Henri Fraisse|Gilles Sandier|Dominique Moune|Tord Pååg|René Pascal|Pascale Savornin|Isabelle Petit|Roger Fjellstrom|Isabelle de Winter|Sven Frostenson|José Ruiz Pernias
title: Al azar de Baltasar
